name: GitHub Classroom
description: Automates repository creation and access control, making it easy to distribute starter code and collect assignments on GitHub.

AIRBRAKE_PROJECT_ID.description: the ID for the application in airbrake.io, if set Airbrake will be enabled

AIRBRAKE_PROJECT_KEY.description: the PROJECT_KEY for the application in airbrake.io, if set Airbrake will be enabled

CLASSROOM_WEBHOOK_PREFIX_URL.description: The URL for your application to recieve webhooks ex https://classroom.github.com

NON_STAFF_GITHUB_ADMIN_IDS.description: GitHub IDs of non GitHub staff members that have staff access.
